InstructionData.Title: ST_MainFurnaceCntrl
InstructionData.Author: Orpheus2468
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias SelectReceip d0 alias Start d1 alias ControlIC d3 alias Hash db alias SelectValue r0 alias Startcmd r2 alias HashValue r15 move HashValue 0 move SelectValue 0 s SelectReceip Mode 17 #Feedback alias TankHeating d2 alias PumpFillingCooling d4 alias PumpFillingHeating d5 alias TM r1 s PumpFillingCooling On 0 s PumpFillingHeating On 0
Main: l TM TankHeating TotalMoles sle TM TM 10000 s PumpFillingHeating On TM seq TM TM 0 s PumpFillingCooling On TM
#normal code s Hash Setting HashValue #stores Target Hash l Startcmd Start Setting s ControlIC Setting Startcmd #Convert value to Hash l SelectValue SelectReceip Setting mul SelectValue SelectValue 2 #two lines per hash add SelectValue SelectValue 1 #start current line +1 jr SelectValue move HashValue 0 j Main move HashValue -404336834 #Copper 1 j Main move HashValue 226410516 #Gold 2 j Main move HashValue -1301215609 #Iron 3 j Main move HashValue 2134647745 #Lead 4 j Main move HashValue -1406385572 #Nickel 5 j Main move HashValue -290196476 #Silicon 6 j Main move HashValue -929742000 #Silver 7 j Main move HashValue 1058547521 #Constantan 8 j Main move HashValue 502280180 #Electrum 9 j Main move HashValue -297990285 #Invar 10 j Main move HashValue -82508479 #Solder 11 j Main move HashValue -654790771 #Steel 12 j Main move HashValue 412924554 #Astroloy 13 j Main move HashValue 1579842814 #Hastelloy 14 j Main move HashValue -787796599 #Inconel 15 j Main move HashValue -1897868623 #Stellite 16 j Main move HashValue 156348098 #Waspaloy 17 j Main
j Main #backup :-)
